name: Uttar Pradesh Voluntary Action Network

address: Raitha Road, Chhatha Meal, Behind Police Fire Station

briefDescription: UPVAN is a broad based state level network of voluntary organizations. It is a registered organization under Society Registration Act 1860, with Foreign Contribution Regulation Act-1976 and section 12(A) of the Income Tax Act 1950. UPVAN provides support services like Documentation,Information dissemination, Image Building,Issue based advocacy & lobbying etc. to its member organizations. Its broad objectives are to increase interaction, to initiate policy level intervention and to promote sectoral linkage among VOs. Presently UPVAN has 78 members in 42 district of the State, which includes 54 General Members and 24 Associates Members.
